title: High-normal serum bilirubin is a useful indicator to assess the risk of diabetic retinopathy in type 2 diabetes: A real-world study
content:
Publication date: 15 August 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 15

Author(s): Man-Rong Xu, Jun-Wei Wang, Yi-Lin Ma, Yu-Jie Wang, Meng-Han Li, Jun-Xi Lu, Lian-Xi Li
